data.title: What are the differences between a 2x2 Rubik's Cube from a 3x3 Rubik's Cube?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): I’ll go over the main properties of each, so you can see their characteristics and differences.

2x2 Rubik’s Cube

 * A 2x2 Rubik’s Cube is also called a Pocket Cube (aka Mini Cube, aka Ice Cube).
 * It has exactly 3,674,160 (3.6 million) possible (valid) states. If you take it a...
